thread.section_title: Ancestry.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ancestry.com | www.ancestry.com
thread.title: Rebecca Gonzalez

author: Rebecca Gonzalez
title: Rebecca Gonzalez
text: Don't waste your money on this service. You send your sample in and go in into deep dark hole. The only thing you hear from the, is trying to sell you additional services. 3 months since I sent my sample in and can't even get an answer. Finally got ahold of some one who manipulates arrival dates etc.. and now it is going to be another 6-8 was. They read a script. Bs don't waste you time or money.
